fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- After abstaining from voting, this night you may use your ability. (Because abstinence from drinking saves lives)
- At night, if you abstained the last day, you may choose up to 3 targets, who you will Drive home.
- If they attack someone, they instead attack you, because you're driving them home and they aren't at someone else's house.
- If you die, your car crashes, dealing a powerful attack to all targets you Drove home (because they're in your car).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You won't redirect astral attacks.
- If more than 1 target in your car is non-town, your passengers conspire against you, and no one dies in your car crash except you.
- If you die in a car crash you are cleansed.
